name: NSEvent.EventType
desc: The types of events handled by responder objects.

items.name: case leftMouseDown
items.desc: The user pressed the left mouse button.

items.name: case leftMouseUp
items.desc: The user released the left mouse button.

items.name: case rightMouseDown
items.desc: The user pressed the right mouse button.

items.name: case rightMouseUp
items.desc: The user released the right mouse button.

items.name: case mouseMoved
items.desc: The user moved the mouse in a way that caused the cursor to move onscreen.

items.name: case leftMouseDragged
items.desc: The user moved the mouse while holding down the left mouse button.

items.name: case rightMouseDragged
items.desc: The user moved the mouse while holding down the right mouse button.

items.name: case mouseEntered
items.desc: The cursor entered a well-defined area, such as a view.

items.name: case mouseExited
items.desc: The cursor exited a well-defined area, such as a view.

items.name: case keyDown
items.desc: The user pressed a key on the keyboard.

items.name: case keyUp
items.desc: The user released a key on the keyboard.

items.name: case flagsChanged
items.desc: The event flags changed.

items.name: case appKitDefined
items.desc: An AppKit-related event occurred.

items.name: case systemDefined
items.desc: A system-related event occurred.

items.name: case applicationDefined
items.desc: An app-defined event occurred.

items.name: case periodic
items.desc: An event that provides execution time to periodic tasks.

items.name: case cursorUpdate
items.desc: An event that updates the cursor.

items.name: case scrollWheel
items.desc: The scroll wheel position changed.

items.name: case tabletPoint
items.desc: The user touched a point on a tablet.

items.name: case tabletProximity
items.desc: A pointing device is near, but not touching, the associated tablet.

items.name: case otherMouseDown
items.desc: The user pressed a tertiary mouse button.

items.name: case otherMouseUp
items.desc: The user released a tertiary mouse button.

items.name: case otherMouseDragged
items.desc: The user moved the mouse while holding down a tertiary mouse button.

items.name: case gesture
items.desc: The user performed a nonspecific type of gesture.

items.name: case magnify
items.desc: The user performed a pinch-open or pinch-close gesture.

items.name: case swipe
items.desc: The user performed a swipe gesture.

items.name: case rotate
items.desc: The user performed a rotate gesture.

items.name: case beginGesture
items.desc: An event marking the beginning of a gesture.

items.name: case endGesture
items.desc: An event that marks the end of a gesture.

items.name: case smartMagnify
items.desc: The user performed a smart-zoom gesture.

items.name: case pressure
items.desc: An event that reports a change in pressure on a pressure-sensitive device.

items.name: case directTouch
items.desc: The user touched a portion of the touch bar.

items.name: case quickLook
items.desc: An event that initiates a Quick Look request.

items.name: case changeMode
items.desc: The user changed the mode of a connected device.
